author: LinkMarioSamus

text:
I honestly think this is one of the best Castlevania games out there. (The best ones are Symphony Of The Night, Circle Of Moon, the first one, Bloodlines, Chronicles, Dawn Of Sorrow and this one IMHO). It's the first time where I felt the plot was actually meaningful and fairly well made.

It also helps that the production values are off the fucking roof.

author: Rory C. Mahan

text: Haters going to hate but this was my first Castlevania and thanks to LOS I have played many of the titles: SOTN, all the DS entries, Super Castlevania 4, Rondo of blood....I absolutely love Castlevania thanks to MercurySteam's interpretation and can't help but get angry when apparent "die hard fans" trash LOS, its an amazing render of a current-gen modern Castlevania with the only story beyond superficial "slay dracula, hes evil" template but thats just me. Cannot wait for LOS2.

author: kemsus

text: When compared to previous 3D Castlevania games, this is easily my favorite one. I actually love it on its own, it's a very solid game with an interesting battle system (light/dark) and amazing graphics. The music was the most disappointing part, it's well composed but it's just "there", in the background. Most of it doesn't stand out (with exceptions like the Waterfalls theme). This final battle theme, however, is absolutely great and memorable. I posted a live version in the description.
author: SupraDarky
